Title: #367: Do, Document, Delegate with Chris Ronzio
Description:
If your goal is to grow your business, Trainual Founder and CEO Chris Ronzio—who successfully grew his own company by 500% in just one year—has some advice: If you want to do something differently tomorrow, you’ve got to teach someone else what you’re doing today. In other words, you’ve got to learn how to delegate responsibilities—but that’s tough to do if you never take the time to clearly document how you do the things you do. Tune in to hear Chris break down his do-document-delegate approach that will help you scale knowledge, empower your team, and maximize productivity.
